item.title: Chi-square Correlation Test for Nominal Data
item.description: In this article, we will discuss the chi-square correlation test for detecting correlations between two series. Steps Find out all the possible values of the two nominal series A and B; Count the co-occurrences of the combinations (A, B); Calculate the expected co-occurrences of the combinations (A, B); Calculate chi-square; Determine whether the hypothesis can be rejected. Define the Series Suppose we are analyzing two series A and B.
